methods.javadoc:
Constructs a new ListingPanel using the given FormatManager and ServiceProvider.
@param manager the FormatManager to use.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new ListingPanel using the given FormatManager and ServiceProvider.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new ListingPanel for the given program.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program for which to create a new ListingPanel

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new ListingPanel with the given FormatManager and ListingLayoutModel

methods.javadoc: A width for new windows that shows a reasonable amount of the Listing
methods.name: getNewWindowDefaultWidth
methods.comment: A width for new windows that shows a reasonable amount of the Listing

methods.javadoc:
Sets the ProgramLocationListener. Only one listener is supported
@param listener the ProgramLocationListener to use.
methods.name: setProgramLocationListener
methods.comment: Sets the ProgramLocationListener. Only one listener is supported

methods.javadoc:
Sets the ProgramSelectionListener. Only one listener is supported
@param listener the ProgramSelectionListener to use.
methods.name: setProgramSelectionListener
methods.comment: Sets the ProgramSelectionListener. Only one listener is supported

methods.javadoc:
Sets the ListingLayoutModel to use.
@param newModel the model to use.
methods.name: setListingModel
methods.comment: Sets the ListingLayoutModel to use.

methods.javadoc: Returns the current ListingModel used by this panel.
methods.name: getListingModel
methods.comment: Returns the current ListingModel used by this panel.

methods.name: showHeader
methods.comment:
Sets whether or not the field header component is visible at the top of the
 listing panel

params.name: show
params.comment: if true, the header component will be show, otherwise it will be hidden.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the field header component is showing.
methods.name: isHeaderShowing
methods.comment: Returns true if the field header component is showing.

methods.name: addMarginProvider
methods.comment: Adds the MarginProvider to this panel

params.name: provider
params.comment:
the MarginProvider that will provide components to display in this
 panel's left margin area.

methods.javadoc:
Add a change listener to be notified whenever the indexMap changes.
@param listener the listener to be added.
methods.name: addIndexMapChangeListener
methods.comment: Add a change listener to be notified whenever the indexMap changes.

methods.javadoc:
Removes the change listener to be notified when the indexMap changes.
@param listener the listener to be removed.
methods.name: removeIndexMapChangeListener
methods.comment: Removes the change listener to be notified when the indexMap changes.

methods.javadoc:
Removes the given margin provider from this panel
@param provider the MarginProvider to remove.
methods.name: removeMarginProvider
methods.comment: Removes the given margin provider from this panel

methods.name: addOverviewProvider
methods.comment:
Adds the given OverviewProvider with will be displayed in this panels right margin
 area.

methods.javadoc:
Removes the given OverviewProvider from this panel
@param provider the OverviewProvider to remove.
methods.name: removeOverviewProvider
methods.comment: Removes the given OverviewProvider from this panel

methods.name: addButtonPressedListener
methods.comment:
Adds a ButtonPressedListener to be notified when the user presses the mouse button while
 over this panel

methods.javadoc:
Removes the given ButtonPressedListener.
@param listener the ButtonPressedListener to remove.
methods.name: removeButtonPressedListener
methods.comment: Removes the given ButtonPressedListener.

methods.name: removeHighlightProvider
methods.comment: Removes the given HighlightProvider from this listing.

methods.name: addHighlightProvider
methods.comment:
Adds a HighlightProvider to this listing.   This highlight provider will be used
 with any other registered providers to paint all the highlights for this listing.

methods.javadoc: Returns the FieldPanel used by this ListingPanel.
methods.name: getFieldPanel
methods.comment: Returns the FieldPanel used by this ListingPanel.

methods.javadoc: Returns the divider location between the left margin areas and the main display.
methods.name: getDividerLocation
methods.comment: Returns the divider location between the left margin areas and the main display.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the divider location between the left margin areas and the main display.
@param dividerLocation the location to set on the divider.
methods.name: setDividerLocation
methods.comment: Sets the divider location between the left margin areas and the main display.

params.name: dividerLocation
params.comment: the location to set on the divider.

methods.name: goTo
methods.comment:
Moves the cursor to the given program location and repositions the scrollbar to
 show that location in the screen.

methods.name: goTo
methods.comment:
Moves the cursor to the given program location.  Also, repositions the scrollbar to
 show that location, if the location is not on the screen.

params.name: centerWhenNotVisible
params.comment:
this variable only has an effect if the given location is not
                             on the screen.  In that case, when this parameter is true, then
                             the given location will be placed in the center of the screen;
                             when the parameter is false, then the screen will be scrolled
                             only enough to show the cursor.

methods.javadoc: Scroll the view of the listing to the given location.
methods.name: scrollTo
methods.comment: Scroll the view of the listing to the given location.

methods.javadoc: Center the view of the listing around the given location.
methods.name: center
methods.comment: Center the view of the listing around the given location.

methods.javadoc:
Positions the ListingPanel to the given address.
@param addr the address at which to position the listing.
methods.name: goTo
methods.comment: Positions the ListingPanel to the given address.

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address at which to position the listing.

methods.name: goTo
methods.comment: Positions the ListingPanel to the given address.

params.name: currentAddress
params.comment:
used to determine which symbol to goto if the goto address has more
 than one

params.name: gotoAddress
params.comment: the address at which to position to listing.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the program to be displayed by this listing panel
@param program the program to display.
methods.name: setProgram
methods.comment: Sets the program to be displayed by this listing panel

methods.javadoc:
Restricts the program's view to the given address set
@param view the set of address to include in the view.
methods.name: setView
methods.comment: Restricts the program's view to the given address set

params.name: view
params.comment: the set of address to include in the view.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the view of this listing panel (meant to be used in conjunction with
 {@link #setView(AddressSetView)}.
methods.name: getView
methods.comment:
Gets the view of this listing panel (meant to be used in conjunction with
 #setView(AddressSetView).

methods.name: setBackgroundColorModel
methods.comment:
Sets the externally supplied ListingBackgroundColorModel to be blended with
 its own PropertyBasedBackgroundColorModel.

params.name: colorModel
params.comment:
the ListingBackgroundColorModel to use in conjunction with
 the built-in PropertyBasedBackgroundColorModel

methods.javadoc:
Sets the background color for the listing panel.  This will set the background for the
 main listing display.
methods.name: setTextBackgroundColor
methods.comment:
Sets the background color for the listing panel.  This will set the background for the
 main listing display.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if this component has focus.
methods.name: isActive
methods.comment: Returns true if this component has focus.

methods.javadoc: Returns the current program location of the cursor.
methods.name: getProgramLocation
methods.comment: Returns the current program location of the cursor.

methods.name: getProgramLocation
methods.comment: Get a program location for the given point.

return.comment:
program location, or null if point does not correspond
 to a program location

methods.javadoc: Get the margin providers in this ListingPanel.
methods.name: getMarginProviders
methods.comment: Get the margin providers in this ListingPanel.

methods.javadoc: Get the overview providers in this ListingPanel.
methods.name: getOverviewProviders
methods.comment: Get the overview providers in this ListingPanel.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the mouse is at a location that can be dragged.
methods.name: isStartDragOk
methods.comment: Returns true if the mouse is at a location that can be dragged.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the cursor to the given program location.
@param loc the location at which to move the cursor.
methods.name: setCursorPosition
methods.comment: Sets the cursor to the given program location.

params.name: loc
params.comment: the location at which to move the cursor.

methods.javadoc: Returns the AddressIndexMap currently used by this listing panel.
methods.name: getAddressIndexMap
methods.comment: Returns the AddressIndexMap currently used by this listing panel.

methods.javadoc: Returns the vertical scrollbar used by this panel.
methods.name: getVerticalScrollBar
methods.comment: Returns the vertical scrollbar used by this panel.

methods.javadoc: Returns the FormatManager used by this listing panel.
methods.name: getFormatManager
methods.comment: Returns the FormatManager used by this listing panel.

methods.javadoc: Returns the current program selection.
methods.name: getProgramSelection
methods.comment: Returns the current program selection.

methods.javadoc: Sets the selection to the entire listing view.
methods.name: selectAll
methods.comment: Sets the selection to the entire listing view.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the selection to the complement of the current selection in the
 listing view.
methods.name: selectComplement
methods.comment:
Sets the selection to the complement of the current selection in the
 listing view.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the selection.
@param sel the new selection
methods.name: setSelection
methods.comment: Sets the selection.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the highlight.
@param highlight the new highlight.
methods.name: setHighlight
methods.comment: Sets the highlight.

methods.javadoc:
Sets listing panel to never show scroll bars.  This is useful when you want this listing's
 parent to always be as big as this listing.
methods.name: setNeverSroll
methods.comment:
Sets listing panel to never show scroll bars.  This is useful when you want this listing's
 parent to always be as big as this listing.
